plot: Telmo and Luis, two young guys, decide to change their lives and carry out their most cherished dream: to visit Benidorm.
title: Aquí no hay playa
plot_es: Telmo and Luis, two young guys, decide to change their lives and carry out their most cherished dream: to visit Benidorm.
plot_en: Telmo and Luis, two young guys, decide to change their lives and carry out their most cherished dream: to visit Benidorm.
